info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greenville, north central Anderson and northeastern Pickens Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pickens, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easley, Pickens, Greenville Downtown, West Greenville, Berea, Welcome, Powdersville, Travelers Rest, Paris Mountain State Park and Cherrydale Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
